programme.title: Le masque
programme.desc:
(4) U.S. 1994. A nerdy bank clerk finds an ancient mask which turns him into a smooth-talking revved-up green super-hero.
Réalisation : C. Russell Chuck Russell
Avec : Jim Carrey Cameron Diaz Peter Greene

programme.title: Heart to Heart
programme.desc: Who doesn't love a good love story? Heart to Heart tells the tales of three couples with something in common: one of the partners has a disability.

programme.title: Le masque
programme.desc:

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc: (S10EP34) One of Canada's most iconic landmarks is now accessible. Reporter Jillian Gillis checks out the changes. Then, Contributor Henry Bockstael shares his thoughts on what interdependence means and how he gets involved with his community.

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc: (S09EP34) C'est le retour de la campagne Quartiers accessibles de la Fondation INCA. Nous prendrons également des nouvelles de l'Association québécoise des personnes de petite taille.

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
Michael Coteau, Liberal MPP, and Christopher Skeete, Coalition Avenir Québec MLA, debate Bill 21, the law in Québec that bans public servants (such as judges, police officers and teachers).
Année : 2017

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Jared Flitcroft is a filmmaker, businessman, family man, and he is Deaf. Overcoming barriers to achieve success in the film industry, Jared hopes for a future with NZSL used more widely.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Eighteen year old OJ lost his sister to Cystic Fibrosis ; a genetic lung condition he has also inherited. Every breath is a challenge for OJ, but with whanau support he's making each one count.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Postcards From ...
programme.desc:
Join AMI presenters Laura Bain and Shelby Travers as they travel to Canada's most easterly province, Newfoundland and Labrador, and experience the dramatic coastlines, colourful culture and friendly people in this unique part of the country.
Année : 2011

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc:
(S09EP35) Alex Smyth catches up with our very own Victoria Nolan, as she gears up for the Paralympics in Tokyo. Then, get to know Chris Vallée, Ottawa's bureau reporter.
Année : 2011

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc:
(S10EP34) One of Canada's most iconic landmarks is now accessible. Reporter Jillian Gillis checks out the changes. Then, Contributor Henry Bockstael shares his thoughts on what interdependence means and how he gets involved with his community.

programme.title: Sitting Tall: The Patrick Anderson Story
programme.desc:
Sitting Tall: The Patrick Anderson Story examines the background and career of Patrick Anderson, arguably the greatest wheelchair basketball player of all time as he prepares for the 2020 Paralympic Games in Tokyo.
Année : 2011

programme.title: The Invincible James Lee
programme.desc:
James Lee is a husband, father, avid athlete, and is about to become a double amputee. Follow James on his journey, from early doctor's appointments to the surgery room and eventual recovery.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Non-binary performance artist Susan Williams adores theatre. Their latest show, Illegally Blind, is based on their experience living with Visual Snow Syndrome - a rare form of blindness.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
(S18EP13) Over 6 feet tall at just 13 years old, Milly manages the rare condition Marfan Syndrome, while grieving the loss of her mum to bowel cancer.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Mon père
programme.desc:
(4) U.S. 1989. While his mother is in the hospital, a man winds up becoming his dad's caretaker and companion, and they grow closer than they've ever been.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Best of Now With Dave Brown
programme.desc:
(S04EP16) Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, entertainment, sports and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Best of Kelly and Ramya
programme.desc:
(S01EP16) Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Son of a Critch
programme.desc:
(S01EP09) Mark and Mike Sr unexpectedly bond over Mark's role in a school play. Meanwhile, Pop turns to Mary for help after the CRA learns he's been collecting his dead wife's pension checks.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Mr.D
programme.desc:
(S08EP01) The 'Insider's Look' exposé on Gerry costs him his job and makes it impossible to get a new one, so he has no choice but to get as far away as he can to start a new life, leaving Xavier behind.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:

Année : 2008
